# The `IRBuilderCallbackInserter` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Provides an &#39;InsertHelper&#39; that calls a user-provided callback after performing the default insertion. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::IRBuilderCallbackInserter</CodeBlock>

## Base class

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderdefaultinserter">IRBuilderDefaultInserter</a></>}>
This provides the default implementation of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder</a> &#39;InsertHelper&#39; method that is called whenever an instruction is created by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder</a> and needs to be inserted. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderdefaultinserter/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>
